☕ Java Tutorial Lessons 1-8

1. What is Java? - Introduction to OOP, JVM, platform independence
2. Setup & First Program - JDK installation, compilation, execution
3. Variables & Data Types - int, String, double, boolean, casting
4. Operators - Arithmetic, logical, comparison, bitwise
5. Control Flow - if/else, switch statements
6. Loops - for, while, do-while, enhanced for
7. Methods/Functions - Method definition, parameters, return types
8. Classes & OOP - Class definition, inheritance, polymorphism
